attributes.action: investigate whether we can continue to provide council houses to larger than average Muslim families due to their religious belief.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As it in title.
The Office of National Statistics reports that people of the Muslim faith are more likely to be living in Council Accommodation, than any other family.

I would write more but my petition would get rejected for the 100th time!
